S04n453:1: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04n453:8: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt ||
S04n453:9: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-tathāgatagarbho mahāmate kuśalākuśalahetukaḥ sarvajanmagatikartā pravartate naṭavadgatisaṃkaṭa ātmātmīyavarjitaḥ |
S04n453:15: teṣāṃ copāttānāmindriyākhyānāṃ parikṣayanirodhe samantarānutpatteranyeṣāṃ svamativikalpasukhaduḥkhāpratisaṃvedināṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattisamāpannānāṃ caturdhyānasatyavimokṣakuśalānāṃ yogināṃ vimokṣabuddhirbhavatyapravṛtteḥ ||
S04n453:16: aparāvṛtte ca tathāgatagarbhaśabdasaṃśabdite ālayavijñāne nāsti saptānāṃ pravṛttivijñānānāṃ nirodhaḥ |
S04n453:22: tato'calāyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito daśasamādhisukhamukhamārgān pratilabhate |
S04n453:25: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhaḥ ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito viśodhayitavyo viśeṣārthibhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ ||
S04n453:26: yadi hi mahāmate ālayavijñānasaṃśabditastathāgatagarbho'tra na syāditi asati mahāmate tathāgatagarbhe ālayavijñānasaṃśabdite na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ syāt |
S04n453:29: mahāmate ayaṃ tathāgatagarbhālayavijñānagocaraḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyavitarkadarśanānāṃ prakṛtipariśuddho'pi san aśuddha ivāgantukleśopakliṣṭatayā teṣāmābhāti na tu tathāgatānām |
S04n453:31: etadeva mahāmate mayā śrīmālāṃ devīmadhikṛtya deśanāpāṭhe anyāṃśca sūkṣmanipuṇaviśuddhabuddhīn bodhisattvānadhiṣṭhāya tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabditaḥ saptabhirvijñānaiḥ saha pravṛttyabhiniviṣṭānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmanairātmyapradarśanārthaṃ śrīmālāṃ devīmadhiṣṭhāya tathāgataviṣayo deśito na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānyatīrthakaratarkaviṣayo'nyatra mahāmate tathāgataviṣaya eva tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānaviṣayastvatsadṛśānāṃ ca sūkṣmanipuṇamatibuddhiprabhedakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmarthapratiśaraṇānāṃ no tu yathārutadeśanāpāṭhābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvānyatīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām |
S04n453:32: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatathāgataviṣaye'smiṃstathāgatagarbhālayavijñānaparijñāne yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
S04n453:39: aṅgulyagraṃ yathā bālo na gṛhṇāti niśākaram |
S04n453:42: vijñānaṃ pañcabhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛśyaṃ kalpeti raṅgavat || 4 ||
S04n453:43: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04n453:45: yena nairātmyadvayaprabhedagatilakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvabhūmikramānusaṃdhiṣvetān dharmān vibhāvayema,
S04n453:51: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
S04n453:53: yaduta nāma nimittaṃ vikalpaḥ samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca tathāgatapratyātmāryagatipraveśaḥ śāśvatocchedasadasaddṛṣṭivivarjito dṛṣṭadharmasukhasamāpattisukhavihāra āmukhībhavati yogayoginām |
S04n453:54: tatra mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvavijñānanairātmyadvayasvacittadṛśyabāhyabhāvābhāvānavabodhādvikalpaḥ pravartate bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām ||
S04n453:61: abhisaṃskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ kośakārakīṭakā iva svavikalpapariveṣṭitamatayo gatisamudrakāntāraprapatitā ghaṭiyantravannātipravartante |
S04n453:66: tatra vikalpaḥ punarmahāmate yena nāma samudīrayati |
S04n453:70: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yena samyagjñānena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nāma bhāvīkaroti,
S04n453:74: tathatāvyavasthitaśca mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirābhāsagocarapratilābhitvātpramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ pratilabhate ||
S04n453:75: sa pratilabhya pramuditāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ vyāvṛttaḥ sarvatīrthyāpāyagatibhyo bhavati lokottaradharmagatisamavasṛtaḥ lakṣaṇaparicayānmāyādipūrvakāṃ sarvadharmagatiṃ vibhāvayan svapratyātmāryadharmagatilakṣaṇaṃ tarkadṛṣṭivinivṛttakautuko'nupūrveṇa yāvaddharmameghā bhūmiriti |
S04n453:86: tatra nāma ca nimittaṃ ca parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ |
S04n453:87: yaḥ punarmahāmate tadāśrayapravṛtto vikalpaścittacaittasaṃśabdito yugapatkālodita āditya iva raśmisahito vicitralakṣaṇasvabhāvo vikalpādhārakaḥ,
S04n453:89: samyagjñānaṃ tathatā ca mahāmate avināśatvātsvabhāvaḥ pariniṣpanno veditavyaḥ ||
S04n453:92: eṣu mahāmate pañcasu dharmeṣu sarvabuddhadharmā antargatāḥ,
S04n453:95: punaraparaṃ mahāmate pañcadharmāḥ-nimittaṃ nāma vikalpastathatā samyagjñānaṃ ca |
S04n453:96: tatra mahāmate nimittaṃ yatsaṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣākārarūpādilakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate tannimittam |
S04n453:98: yena tannāma samudīrayati nimittābhivyañjakaṃ samadharmeti vā,
S04n453:101: tattvaṃ bhūtaṃ niścato niṣṭhā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvo'nupalabdhistattathālakṣaṇam |
S04n453:102: mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairanugamya yathāvaddeśitaṃ prajñaptaṃ vivṛtamuttānīkṛtam,
S04n453:113: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvaśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca |
S04n453:117: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā deśanāpāṭhe yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā atītā anāgatā vartamānāśca |
S04n453:122: na ca mahāmate gaṅgānadīvālukāpramāṇatayā tryadhvakabuddhapramāṇatā bhavati |
S04n453:125: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadṛśāsadṛśaṃ lokātiśayātikrāntaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
S04n453:128: yathā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti nityānityābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ tīrthakarāśayakudṛṣṭiyuktānāṃ saṃsārabhavacakrānusāriṇāmudvejanārtham-kathamete udvignā bhavagaticakrasaṃkaṭādviśeṣārthino viśeṣamārabheranniti sulabhabuddhatvapradarśanārthaṃ na nodumbarapuṣpatulyastathāgatānāmutpāda iti kṛtvā vīryamārapsyante |
S04n453:129: deśanāpāṭhe tu mayā vaineyajanatāpekṣayā udumbarapuṣpasudurlabhaprādurbhāvāstathāgatā iti deśitam |
S04n453:130: na ca mahāmate udumbarapuṣpaṃ kenaciddṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na drakṣyate |
S04n453:134: svanayapratyavasthānakathāyāṃ mahāmate nirdiśyamānāyāṃ lokātiśayātikrāntā dṛṣṭāntā yuktāḥ kriyante'śraddheyatvāt |
S04n453:139: kiṃ tu upamāmātrametanmahāmate kṛtaṃ yaduta gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatāḥ samā na viṣamā akalpāvikalpanataḥ |
S04n453:140: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā mīnakacchapaśiśumāranakramahiṣasiṃhahastyādibhiḥ saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti-saṃkṣobhyāmahe na veti nirvikalpāḥ svacchā malavyapetāḥ |
S04n453:141: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ svapratyātmāryajñānagaṅgāmahānadībalābhijñāvaśitāvālukāḥ sarvatīrthakarabālamīnaparapravādibhiḥ saṃkṣobhyamāṇā na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti |
S04n453:144: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā pṛthivīlakṣaṇasvabhāvatvātpṛthivī,
S04n453:146: na ca mahāmate pṛthivī dahyate tejodhātupratibaddhatvādanyatra bālapṛthagjanā vitathatāpatitayā saṃtatyā dahyamānāṃ kalpayanti,
S04n453:149: tadyathā mahāmate nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ vālukā apramāṇāḥ,
S04n453:150: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ raśmyāloko'pramāṇaḥ sattvaparipākasaṃcodanamupādāya sarvabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu prasarpyate tathāgataiḥ |
S04n453:151: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā na vālukāsvabhāvāntaramārabhante,
S04n453:153: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saṃsāre na pravṛttirna nivṛttiḥ,
S04n453:155: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā apakṛṣṭā api na prajñāyante,
S04n453:157: mahāmate evameva tathāgatānāṃ jñānaṃ sattvaparipākayogena na kṣīyate na vardhate,
S04n453:159: śarīravatāṃ hi mahāmate nāśo bhavati nāśarīravatām |
S04n453:161: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukā niṣpīḍyamānā ghṛtatailārthibhirghṛtatailādivirahitāḥ,
S04n453:162: evameva mahāmate tathāgatāḥ sattvaduḥkhairniṣpīḍyamānā dharmadhātvīśvarapraṇidhānasukhaṃ na vijahati mahāmate mahākaruṇopetatvāt,
S04n453:164: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukāḥ pravāhānukūlāḥ pravahanti nānudake,
S04n453:165: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmadeśanā nirvāṇapravāhānukūlā saṃvartate |
S04n453:169: na ca mahāmate saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭiḥ prajñāyate |
S04n453:173: mahāmatirāha-tadyadi bhagavan pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyate sattvānāṃ saṃsaratām,
S04n453:179: adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ buddhyā |
S04n453:188: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu bhagavān,
S04n453:189: deśayatu me sugatastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaṃ bhedalakṣaṇaṃ caiṣām |
S04n453:194: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
S04n453:195: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate yaduta kuśalākuśalāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā laukikalokottarāḥ sāvadyānavadyāḥ sāsravānāsravā upāttānupāttāḥ |
S04n453:197: samādhisukhasamāpattayo mahāmate dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārabhāvena āryāṇāṃ kuśalānāsravā ityucyante |
S04n453:200: yaduta tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito mano manovijñānaṃ ca pañca ca vijñānakāyāstīrthyānuvarṇitāḥ |
S04n453:201: tatra mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā manovijñānasahitā kuśalākuśalakṣaṇaparaṃparābhedabhinnāḥ saṃtatiprabandhanābhinnaśarīrāḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante |
S04n453:204: saṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣagrāhakaṃ manovijñānaṃ pañcabhirvijñānakāyaiḥ saha saṃprayuktaṃ pravartate kṣaṇakālānavasthāyi |
S04n453:206: kṣaṇikaṃ punarmahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ tathāgatagarbhasaṃśabditaṃ manaḥsahitaṃ pravṛttivijñānavāsanābhiḥ kṣaṇikamanāsravavāsanābhirakṣaṇikam |
S04n453:207: na ca bālapṛthagjanā avabudhyante kṣaṇikavādābhiniviṣṭā kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatāmimāṃ sarvadharmāṇām |
S04n453:209: asaṃsāriṇo mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā ananubhūtasukhaduḥkhā anirvāṇahetavaḥ |
S04n453:210: tathāgatagarbhaḥ punarmahāmate anubhūtasukhaduḥkhahetusahitaḥ pravartate nivartate ca catasṛbhirvāsanābhiḥ saṃmūrcchitaḥ |
S04n453:212: punaraparaṃ mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitāḥ suvarṇavajrajinadhātuprāptiviśeṣā abhaṅginaḥ |
S04n453:216: suvarṇaṃ vajraṃ ca mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitā api tulyamānā na hīyante na vardhante |
S04n453:217: tatkathaṃ bālaiḥ kṣaṇikārthe vikalpyate ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmasaṃdhābhāṣyakuśalaiḥ ?
S04n453:218: punarapi mahāmatirāha-yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā-ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūrya buddhatvamavāpyata iti |
S04n453:228: tatra lokottarābhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nirvāṇagrāhapatitāśayā dānādiṣu prayujyante yathaiva bālā ātmasukhanirvāṇābhilāṣiṇaḥ |
S04n453:229: lokottaratamāḥ punarmahāmate svacittadṛśyavikalpamātragrahaṇātsvacittadvayāvabodhādapravṛttervikalpasya upādānagrahaṇābhāvātsvacittarūpalakṣaṇānabhiniveśāddānapāramitā sarvasattvahitasukhārthamājāyate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paramayogayoginām |
S04n453:234: yena vīryeṇa pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ ghaṭate yogānukūladarśanādvikalpasya vyāvṛtteḥ,
S04n453:237: tatra prajñāpāramitā yadā svacittavikalpābhāvādābuddhipravicayātprativicinvan antadvaye na patati āśrayaparāvṛttipūrvakarmavināśataḥ,
S04n453:247: utpattyanantaraṃ bhaṅgaṃ na vai deśemi bāliśān |
S04n453:249: sā vidyā kāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ cittānāṃ saṃpravartikam |
S04n453:252: rūpaṃ na tiṣṭhate kāle kimālambya pravartsyate || 13 ||
S04n453:259: gandharvapuramāyādyā rūpā vai kṣaṇikā na kim |
